name: Dev Network
description: A site created with the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React & NodeJS) stack designed to enable developers to connect and interact.

name: SpaceX Tracker
description: An app designed to follow SpaceX launches created with React, GraphQL & Apollo.

name: Shopping List
description: An app built with the MERN stack which enable users to sign in, create and edit a shopping list.

name: Quali-Fi
description: A job posting site created with Angular and Ruby on Rails that allows employers to post jobs and applicants to post profiles.

name: Charity Chooser
description: A website designed to aid in locating charities based on user input built using React and Ruby on Rails.

name: Budgit
description: An application to track monthly expenditures built with Ruby on Rails.

name: Simon game
description: A simple game based on Simon built with JavaScript and jQuery.
